definition[0]: someone’s welfare is their health and happiness
example[0]: Our only concern is the children’s welfare.
definition[1]: help that is provided for people who have personal or social problems
example[1]: The company’s welfare officer deals with employees’ personal problems.
example[2]: the provision of education and welfare services
definition[2]: money that is paid by the government in the US to people who are very poor or unemployed
example[3]: Most of the people in this neighborhood are on welfare.
definition[3]: help that is given by government to people with social or financial problems
example[4]: a drastic reform of the welfare system
definition[4]: money paid by the government to people who are poor, unemployed etc
example[5]: Non-profit companies are providing job placement for welfare recipients.
